channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Marc Andreessen Once Called Online Safety Teams an Enemy. He Still Wants Walled Gardens for Kids
item.description: Investor Marc Andreessen called tech ethics and safety teams “the enemy” in his “Techno-Optimist Manifesto” last year. Today he clarified he’s in favo...

item.title: Dealt turns retailers into service providers and proves that pivots sometimes work
item.description: Dealt is now building a service platform for retailers instead of end customers. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Boeing’s Starliner Has Finally Launched a NASA Crew Into Space
item.description: Seven years behind schedule, this month Starliner will send two astronauts to space on a mission for NASA. The troubled company still has lots of catc...

item.title: Hundreds of Snowflake customer passwords found online are linked to info-stealing malware
item.description: Snowflake is the latest company in a string of high-profile security incidents and sizable data breaches caused by the lack of MFA. © 2024 TechCrunch....

item.title: How to Follow the Boeing Starliner Mission
item.description: Boeing’s first ever human-crewed spacecraft has liftoff. Here’s how to follow its journey into space.

item.title: Google acquires Cameyo to bring Windows apps to ChromeOS
item.description: The buy will benefit ChromeOS, Google's lightweight Linux-based operating system, by giving ChromeOS users greater access to Windows apps "without the...

item.title: 2024 Ford Mustang Mach-E Rally First Drive: Price, Specs, Availability
item.description: The all-electric Mustang gets a dirt update—perfect if you prefer going sideways.

item.title: Mistral launches new services and SDK to let customers fine-tune its models
item.description: Mistral is no doubt looking to grow revenue as it faces considerable — and growing — competition in the generative AI space. © 2024 TechCrunch. All ri...

item.title: China Miéville Writes a Secret Novel With the Internet’s Boyfriend (It’s Keanu Reeves)
item.description: After nearly a decade of silence, the beloved sci-fi author opens up about loss, love, and a collaboration with Keanu Reeves. A WIRED exclusive.

item.title: Humane urges customers to stop using charging case, citing battery fire concerns
item.description: The warning for the Ai Pin was issued “out of an abundance of caution,” according to Humane. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use ...
